div.p: Summary of scenarios used in this study

tr.th: Shared socioeconomic pathway and start year of commitment

tr.td: • ZERO: zero emissions commitment• FAST: fast fossil fuel phase out (30 years for energy sector)• MID: central fossil fuel phase out (40 years)• SLOW: slow fossil fuel phase out (50 years)• CONST: constant forcing commitment (only for SSP2-2018 and SSP2c-2030)
